description:
Candy 2048 Challenge brings back the iconic 2048 game with a new multiplayer function. Taking the intense fun of the original 2048 and pitting you against one other friend, to really see who is the best!

Test your intelligence in this infinite puzzle game:
• World famous 2048 game
• Split-screen multiplayer mode for a 1-vs-1 challenge
• Fun and addictive music
• Local leaderboard
name: Candy 2048 Challenge
